title.rendered: Used Truck Parts in Chicago, IL

content.rendered:
Pickup trucks are the signature working man’s vehicle. Their sturdy chassis, all-wheel drivetrains, and exceptional powertrains make them desirable vehicles today. More so, there are trucks for all styles and production years.

Truck culture has its own collective fanbase full of dedicated owners and hobbyists looking for quality OEM parts. If you’re one of them, check out our South Chicago truck parts to find the ones you need. We have parts from top-selling manufacturers, including Ford, Chevrolet, Ram, Toyota, and Nissan!

We Buy and Sell Old Trucks!

Aero Auto Parts buys and sells used trucks! Our salvage yard is full of dozens of trucks from various manufacturers. If you have a specific make and model in mind, chances are we have it! If you also have an old pickup collecting dust in your garage, we’ll take it off your hands! Aero Auto Parts offers free onsite pick-up with cash payments for any used vehicle.

We Have a Vast Selection of Cheap Truck Parts

We have a massive inventory of truck parts in Chicago. Whether you need parts for a midsized, full-sized, or heavy-duty truck, you’ll find them here, including

  • Batteries
  • Body parts
  • Engine parts
  • Windshields
  • Tires and wheels
  • Transmission
  • Headlights
  • Taillights
  • Suspension parts
  • Rims
  • Mirrors
  • And more!

The process is simple: purchase the car parts and take them home! If you can’t make it in person, feel free to search our inventory. Get yours while supplies last!

We’re also happy to help with any specific requests. While we cannot guarantee we’ll have the exact part you need, call us and let us know. We’ll keep an eye open and let you know once the right vehicle comes to our lot.

We’re Here for You!

Customer satisfaction remains our top priority. We want every customer to find the right parts at affordable prices. Whether you’re repairing a vehicle or building a custom project, you can always trust Aero Auto Parts for affordable factory-grade truck parts.

We’re also a business-to-business supplier of OEM auto parts. We sell to body shops, repair garages, and retail customers within the Chicago area. Check out our selection of wholesale auto parts, or call us for wholesale inquiries.

Visit Us or Contact Us Today!

We’re on S Wentworth Ave between Englewood and West Woodlawn if you need used truck parts in Chicago, Illinois. You can call us at 773-483-2626 with questions, concerns, or sales inquiries. Our team provides fast and efficient service to make your visit enjoyable and helpful.
